title: 📚 CBC Curriculum Implementation Update
content: Our school has successfully transitioned to the new Competency-Based Curriculum (CBC). All teaching staff have completed their CBC training, and we're ready to provide quality education under the new system.

title: 🏆 Outstanding KCSE Results 2024
content: We are proud to announce that our students achieved excellent results in the 2024 KCSE examinations, with a 95% pass rate and several students qualifying for university admission.
